Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete MiniPGMT project management system

This commit includes the full implementation of MiniPGMT, a professional project management tool inspired by Jira:

Frontend (React + TypeScript + Vite):
- Complete design system with tokens (colors, spacing, typography, shadows)
- Primitive components (Button, Input, Badge, Avatar, Card, Modal, Select, Tooltip, Progress, Toast)
- Pattern components (StatCard, ProjectCard, IssueCard)
- Layout system (AppShell with responsive sidebar)
- Pages (Dashboard, Board/Kanban, Projects, Component Showcase)
- React Query integration for API data
- Drag-and-drop Kanban board with @dnd-kit

Backend (Spring Boot + PostgreSQL):
- Spring Security with JWT authentication
- Domain entities (User, Project, Issue, Sprint)
- REST controllers and services
- Database repositories with JPA
- Exception handling and validation
- Flyway migrations

Infrastructure:
- Docker Compose setup (PostgreSQL, Redis)
- Comprehensive documentation (CLAUDE.md, README.md, BACKEND_STATUS.md)
- Git ignore configuration
